EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your application to The Challenge - here are your next steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
For your action
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} and Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for beginning {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for a place on NCS with The Challenge.
Unfortunately we have not yet received all the information we need to confirm {!Contact.FirstName}’s place on the programme. Due to high demand for places on The Challenge we have temporarily placed {!Contact.FirstName} on a waiting list until we receive the information we require.
All we need in order to finish processing {!Contact.FirstName}’s place is:
{!Contact.CAL_Missing_Items_Criteria_Paragraph__c} Call us: 0203 542 2400 / Email us: contact@the-challenge.org / Log into our website at: www.the-challenge.org
Replace with website name
As places are filling up very rapidly across the country, we would urge {!Contact.FirstName} to remind friends to take part in this exciting and unique opportunity.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter Director at The Challenge Network
the-challenge.org ncsyes.co.uk /thechallengenetwork /ncs
